en.outro: Well done for completing the IDG mini-challenge.
en.name: Inner development goals mini challenge
en.intro:
Welcome. Want to be a part of the growing community around the inner development goals, the IDG's? They are a set of skills we believe will help you and others around the planet to work towards UN's Sustainable Development Goals.

In this mini-challenge you'll assess yourself, reflect on the IDG skill set, as well as dive into thinking about where you want to go in life.
en.nextStep: Are you up for working more on you IDG skill set? See the [29k web](https://29k.org/inner-development) for tips.
